channel.title: Twitter on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: New Grok AI model surprises experts by checking Elon Musk’s views before answering
item.description: Grok 4’s “reasoning” shows cases where the chatbot consults Musk posts to answer divisive questions.

item.title: Sesame Workshop Says Elmo’s X Account Has Been “Secured” After Hack
item.description: The official Elmo X account posted bizarre and offensive comments over the weekend.
